Material Requested for a Seminary Paper 
     Infidels are at work to devise means of spreading their poison; the papists are plotting daily the suppression of the word of God,--the best means of enslaving the souls of men, and deepening the darkness that already exists. At such a time above all others, God's servants should present a decided front to the enemies of truth.--Ms 6, 1892, p. 2. (To Workers in Australia, January 5, 1892.) 

Released August 7, 1967.
